name: Jewel Master: Cradle of Persia
overview: In Cradle Of Persia, journey through 100 levels of match-3 fun and enjoy the exhilarating process of building the city in the mysterious heart of Ancient Persia. Match three or more tiles and experience the new world of Persia from the cradle to the glory. Solve challenging mini-games and draw blueprints to turn your desert settlement into a flourishing empire. Discover all-new game modes and earn trophies to prove your multi-faceted skills. Features: Travel to 7 historical epochs Conquer your way through over 100 levels Build 20 masterpieces of Ancient Persia Free the genie from Aladdin’s lamp Unlock the wonders of Persepolis and become Caliph of Persia in this highly addictive puzzle game!
